name: Aosaginohi - The blue heron fire (Animated)
description:
In old Japanese folklore,  birds may transform into magical yokais with eerie powers when they reach an certain/ older age. This bizarre phenomenon describing transformed herons, is called  Aosaginohi or Aosagibi.

Since night herons are very shy, even after turning into yokais, they tend to stay away from humans. In a cool autumn night one might see a colony of wild birds breathing blue flames and making strange calls.
